name: F.C. Barcelona Online Trivia | Europe | 20 Questions

questions.text: Who was the club's president from 1978-2000?
questions.explanation:
Josep Lluís Núñez.

	Joan Gaspart replaced him.

questions.text: Who did Barca play, and what was the score on the last game of the 2001-02 Spanish Premier League?
questions.explanation:
Zaragoza 1-1.

	Javier Saviola scored Barca's only goal.

questions.text: Since what year has Barca used The Nou Camp as their stadium?
questions.explanation:
1957.

	It has a capacity of 98,000.

questions.text: From what club did Johan Cruyff move to Barca?
questions.explanation:
Ajax.

	He wore number 14.

questions.text: In what stadium did Barca play before they moved to the Nou Camp?
questions.explanation:
Camp de Les Corts.

	It was used from 1922-1957.

questions.text: When was the club founded?
questions.explanation:
November 29, 1899.

	The club celebrated it's 100th year in 1999, winning the Spanish championship.

questions.text: In the 20th century, how many SPL championships has Barca won?
In the 20th century, how many Spanish cups has Barca won?
When he retired in 1998, what Barca player had played the most games for the Spanish international team?
questions.explanation:
Zubizarreta & Andoni Zubizarreta.

	He played in 126 international games.

questions.text: How many goals did Ronaldo score for Barcelona?
questions.explanation:
54.

	He scored 54 goals in 56 games.

questions.text: How many goals did Ladislao Kubala score for Barca?
questions.explanation:
256.

	He played 329 games for Barcelona, scoring 256 goals in his 10 years at the club.

questions.text: Joahn Cruyff scored 74 goals for Barca.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He played 179 games for Barcelona, scoring 74 goals in his 4 years at the club.

questions.text: How many games did Michael Laudrup play for Barca?
questions.explanation:
166.

	He played 166 games for Barcelona, scoring 40 goals in his 5 years at the club.

questions.text: Before he transferred to Sofia in 1998, Hristo Stoichkov played in 206 games, scoring 95 goals for Barca.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Stoichkov made his debut for the Bulgarian national team on September 23, 1987.

questions.text: Ronald Koeman played in 192 games, scoring __ goals.
questions.explanation:
67.

	in his first year with Ajax, Koeman, who used to be an assistant manager during Louis van Gaal's fisrt term in Barca, lead Ajax to the double (Championship + Cup)in the 2001-02 season.

questions.text: One of Barca's best player of all time, Rivaldo, started his career for a small club in Brazil called Mogi Mirim.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Rivaldo started at Santa Cruz.

questions.text: When was Patrick Kluivert born?
questions.explanation:
July 1, 1976.

	Kluviert made his debut for Barca on September 12, 1998.

questions.text: Who scored Barca's first goal in the 2002-03 SPL, in the game against Atletico Madrid?
questions.explanation:
Luis Enrique.

	Luis Enrique scored the goal in the 5th minute.

questions.text: Who scored Barca's second goal in the 2002-03 SPL, in the game against Atletico Madrid?
questions.explanation:
Luis Enrique.

	It gave Barca a 2-1 lead. The game ended in a 2-2 draw.

questions.text: What was Barca's biggest win against Real Madrid in the 20th Century?
questions.explanation:
5-0.

	The game was held in the Nou Camp.
